biotools.summary: Integrated platform for next-generation sequencing project, the core function of which is to detect SNPs and indels using a Bayesian algorithm.It does not have any read length restriction. It can handle 454 sequencing and/or Illumina Solexa sequencing and/or Sanger sequencing data sets.

bioschemas.name: inGAP
bioschemas.summary: Integrated platform for next-generation sequencing project, the core function of which is to detect SNPs and indels using a Bayesian algorithm.It does not have any read length restriction. It can handle 454 sequencing and/or Illumina Solexa sequencing and/or Sanger sequencing data sets.
